clear.confirm: You are about to clear local data (global settings will not be affected). Please confirm that you have downloaded a data backup.

dbV1.description: In the new version, LobeChat's data storage has made a huge leap. Therefore, we need to upgrade the old version data to bring you a better user experience.

capability.desc: Based on indexedDB technology, it can store a lifetime of conversation messages.
capability.title: High Capacity

performance.desc: Automatic indexing of tens of millions of messages, with millisecond response times for retrieval and queries.
performance.title: High Performance

use.desc: Supports searching for titles, descriptions, tags, message content, and even translated text, greatly improving daily search efficiency.
use.title: More User-Friendly

dbV1.title: LobeChat Data Evolution

error.subTitle:
We are sorry, an exception occurred during the database upgrade process. Please try the following solutions: A. Clear local data and re-import backup data; B. Click the 'Re-upgrade' button.

If the error persists, please <1>submit an issue, and we will help you troubleshoot it as soon as possible.
error.title: Database Upgrade Failed

success.subTitle: LobeChat's database has been successfully upgraded to the latest version. Start experiencing it now!
success.title: Database Upgrade Successful

dbV1.upgradeTip: The upgrade process will take approximately 1-2 seconds. Please do not close LobeChat during the upgrade.

migrateError.missVersion: Imported data is missing a version number. Please check the file and try again.
migrateError.noMigration: No migration plan found for the current file version. Please check the file version and try again. If the issue persists, please submit an issue.
